duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead Continuous Improvement (CI) strategy development, road mapping, and execution at an enterprise level.
Manage stakeholder relationships and organizational change, including developing leadership workshops and building innovation.
Support program management responsibilities, KPI development, tracking, and reporting.
Handle multiple priorities and adjust quickly to changes in priorities.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in business, marketing, finance, or a related field; or equivalent education/experience.
Six Sigma Yellow Belt, Green Belt, or Black Belt certification
Project Management Certification (MBA and cloud computing experience are a plus)
